page.title: 16SANDY SCOUT BAND
page.content: THE BAND I PLAY IN IS THE 1ST SANDY SCOUT AND GUIDE BAND. WE MEET AT THE SANDY SCOUT H.Q. ON FRIDAYS AND SUNDAYS. ON FRIDAY WE GO INTO SECTIONS WHICH ARE PERCUSSION AT ONE END AND TRUMPETS AT THE OTHER. ON SUNDAY WE DO DRILL WHICH IS MARCHING AND TURNING AND THINGS LIKE THAT. I PLAY A NON-VALVE TRUMPET IN THE BAND. WE OFTEN HAVE VALVE TRUMPET PRACTICE. PRACTICES START AT HALF PAST SIX ON FRIDAYS AND AT TEN O'CLOCK ON SUNDAY MORNINGS. WE SOMETIMES PLAY GAMES, AND WE HAVE BREAKS WHEN WE CAN HAVE TEA AND ORANGE. WE PLAY ON LOTS OF OCCASIONS AND ENTER LOTS OF COMPETITIONS.
